title: RPG Game SFX
description: RPG Game SFX contains 340 mono sounds and 415 stereo sounds
longDescription:
RPG Game SFX contains 340 mono sounds and 415 stereo sounds.

This package is perfect for voicing your RPG or fantasy game.


More different sounds can be found here.



Preview:

  • RPG Game SFX Demo


Contains:

  • Action
  1. Action 22 mono and 22 stereo sound

  • Clothes
  1. Cloth 30 mono and 30 stereo sound
  2. Hauberk 30 mono and 30 stereo sound
  3. Heavy Armor 30 mono and 30 stereo sound
  4. Light Armor 30 mono and 30 stereo sound

  • Crafting
  1. Crafting 25 mono and 31 stereo sound

  • Magic only stereo sound
  1. Earth 12 sound (Cast, Hit, Throw, Throw Hit)
  2. Electric 12 sound (Cast, Impact, Throw, Throw Hit sound)
  3. Fire 12 sound (Cast, Mini Cast, Throwing, Throwing Hit sound)
  4. Ice 12 sound (Cast, Hit, Throw, Throw Hit sound)
  5. Water 9 sounds (Cast, Throw, Throw Hit sounds)
  6. Wind 12 sound (Cast, Mini Cast, Throwing )

  • Weapons
  1. Axe 39 mono and 39 stereo sound (body hit, body short hit, hit, hit short, Metal hit, Wood Hit, Wood Hit Short, Throwing, Throwing Wood, Throwing Metal, Throwing Body sound)
  2. Bow: 24 mono and 24 stereo sound (Arrow Hit Body, Arrow Hit Hauberk, Arrow Hit Metal, Arrow Hit Wood, Bow Loading, Flight Arrow sound)
  3. Hammer 56 mono and 56 stereo sound (Hit Blood, Hit Hauberk , Hit Metal, hit wood, Short Hit Metal, Short hit wood, Throwing Metal, Throwing Wood sound)
  4. Hit 15 mono and 15 stereo sound (Hit Blood,Hit Body,Hit Hauberk,Hit Metal,Hit Wood sound)
  5. Shield 6 mono and 6 stereo sound (Metal Shield,Wood Shield sound)
  6. Sword 15 mono and 15 stereo sound (Hauberk Hit,Sword,Throwing Knife sound)
  7. Throwing 10 mono and 10 stereo sound
  8. Whoosh 8 mono and 8 stereo sound
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 755

Number of Audio Cues: 755

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 16bit :44,100 Hz

Seamless Loops: Some

Total audio duration: 14 minutes

Have questions? Write me: soundwork12@gmail.com

Size: 125mb
